targets.expr: sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

ceil(sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Rate of Received Packets Dropped by Namespace (All)
Rate of Transmitted Packets Dropped by Namespace (All)
Top Pods by Memory Usage in '$namespace' Namespace
Top Pods by CPU Usage in '$namespace' Namespace

targets.expr:
sum by(pod) (
  rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{
    job="kubelet",
    metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",
    container!="",
    device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)",
    cluster="$cluster",
    pod!~"pushprox.*",
    namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]
  ) + 
  rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{
    job="kubelet",
    metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",
    container!="",
    pod!~"pushprox.*",
    cluster="$cluster",
    namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]
  )
)

panels.title: Top Pods by ThroughPut(Read+Write) in '$namespace' Namespace

targets.expr:
sum by(pod) (
  rate(container_fs_reads_total{
    job="kubelet",
    metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",
    container!="",
    device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)",
    cluster="$cluster",
    pod!~"pushprox.*",
    namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]
  ) + 
  rate(container_fs_writes_total{
    job="kubelet",
    metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",
    container!="",
    cluster="$cluster",
    pod!~"pushprox.*",
    namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]
  )
)

panels.title: Top Pods by IOPS(Reads+Writes) in '$namespace' Namespace
Top Pods by Inbound Network Traffic in '$namespace' Namespace
Top Pods by Outbound Network Traffic in '$namespace' Namespace

targets.expr:
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{
    job="kubelet",
    metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",
    cluster="$cluster",
    pod!~"pushprox.*",
    namespace="$namespace"}[1m]
)) * 60

panels.title: Rate of Received Packets Dropped per pod in $namespace

targets.expr:
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{
    job="kubelet",
    metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",
    cluster="$cluster",
    pod!~"pushprox.*",
    namespace="$namespace"}[1m]
)) * 60

panels.title: Rate of Transmitted Packets Dropped per pod in $namespace
